statements: SELECT * FROM music_library;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM music_library WHERE artist='Taylor Swift';
SELECT song_title, album_title FROM music_library WHERE genre='Pop' ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM music_library WHERE artist='Ed Sheeran' AND album_title='Divide';
SELECT artist, COUNT(*) AS total_songs FROM music_library GROUP BY artist ORDER BY total_songs DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist, genre FROM music_library WHERE artist = 'Taylor Swift'
SELECT * FROM music_library WHERE genre = 'Pop' AND album_title LIKE '198%' ORDER BY artist ASC
SELECT DISTINCT artist FROM music_library WHERE genre IN ('Jazz', 'Blues') ORDER BY artist ASC
SELECT song_title, artist, album_title FROM music_library WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY album_title DESC, artist ASC
SELECT COUNT(song_id) AS total_songs, genre FROM music_library GROUP BY genre HAVING total_songs > 5 ORDER BY total_songs DESC
SELECT * FROM albums;
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums WHERE genre = 'Pop';
SELECT * FROM songs ORDER BY artist DESC;
SELECT song_title, artist, album_id FROM songs WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY song_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT genre FROM albums;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE genre='Rock';
SELECT album_title, release_date FROM albums WHERE release_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT album_title, COUNT(song_title) AS total_songs FROM albums JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id GROUP BY album_title;
SELECT album_title, artist FROM albums JOIN songs ON albums.album_id = songs.album_id WHERE songs.genre='Pop';
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE album_title LIKE '%Greatest Hits%' ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Songs;
SELECT song_title, artist_name FROM Songs WHERE genre='Pop';
SELECT album_title, release_year FROM Albums ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre FROM Artists WHERE genre='Rock' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_albums FROM Albums;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, genre FROM Songs WHERE genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY artist_name ASC;
SELECT song_title, artist_name, genre FROM Songs WHERE artist_name LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY song_title DESC;
SELECT album_title, release_year, genre FROM Albums WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2000 AND 2010 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT artist_name, debut_album_id, genre FROM Artists WHERE genre = 'Rock' ORDER BY debut_album_id ASC, artist_name DESC;
SELECT s.song_title, a.artist_name, a.genre FROM Songs s INNER JOIN Artists a ON s.artist_name = a.artist_name WHERE s.genre = 'Pop' AND a.genre = 'Pop' ORDER BY s.song_title ASC, a.artist_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name, genre_id FROM genres ORDER BY genre_name DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists INNER JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT album_id, album_title FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT song_title, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 3.5;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT album_title, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2010 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists INNER JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id WHERE genre_name = 'Rock';
SELECT song_title, duration FROM songs WHERE duration > 3.5;
SELECT artist_name, album_title FROM artists INNER JOIN albums ON artists.artist_id = albums.artist_id ORDER BY artist_name ASC, album_title DESC;
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT genre_name FROM genres WHERE genre_id = 1;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums ORDER BY release_year DESC;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists INNER JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT song_title FROM songs WHERE genre_id IN (SELECT genre_id FROM genres WHERE genre_name = 'Rock');
SELECT * FROM genres;
SELECT album_name, release_year FROM albums WHERE release_year > 2000;
SELECT artist_name, genre_name FROM artists INNER JOIN genres ON artists.genre_id = genres.genre_id;
SELECT song_title FROM songs WHERE genre_id = 1 ORDER BY song_title ASC;
SELECT * FROM albums WHERE release_year BETWEEN 2010 AND 2020 ORDER BY release_year DESC;
